analysis.description:
Crowdsale.transferIfTokenAvailable (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#170-233) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token_reward.transfer(_beneficiary,total_token_to_transfer) (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#226-227)

Crowdsale.transferBack (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#263-267) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token_reward.transfer(owner,tokens) (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#264-267)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#237-253):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(transferIfTokenAvailable(tokens,weiAmount,beneficiary)) (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#247-249)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#249-252)

Crowdsale.end_Time should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#89)
Crowdsale.phase_1_token_price should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#95-96)
Crowdsale.phase_2_token_price should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#96-97)
Crowdsale.phase_3_token_price should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#97-99)
Crowdsale.phase_4_token_price should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#100-101)
Crowdsale.start_time should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#88)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_tokens' of Crowdsale.transferIfTokenAvailable (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#171) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_weiAmount' of Crowdsale.transferIfTokenAvailable (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#171) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_beneficiary' of Crowdsale.transferIfTokenAvailable (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol#172) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_eth_to_usd' of Crowdsale.changeEth_to_usd (/unique_chucks/21/0x8f6be35a2cacd597a58feb60d26eef827b1f4940.sol) is not in mixedCase
